title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: When modifying parameters in the dialog details, there are two issues observed. First, the name validation for duplicated names could be performed on the first page. Second, the first and second columns in the dialog details could be merged. This causes the observed behavior where a very long parameter name gets cut off in the preview.
OB: The name validation for duplicated names is not performed on the first page. The first and second columns in the dialog details are not merged. A very long parameter name gets cut off in the preview.
EB: The name validation for duplicated names should be performed on the first page. The first and second columns in the dialog details should be merged. The preview should not cut off any part of a very long parameter name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Go to the dialog details page. 
2. Change a parameter name to something very long. 
3. Observe that the name validation for duplicated names is not performed on the first page. 
4. Observe that the first and second columns in the dialog details are not merged. 
5. Observe that the preview cuts off the very long parameter name.
